title: 2.10 Grappling with the Greeks I: Josephus and the Books of Maccabees
itunes:title: Grappling with the Greeks I: Josephus and the Books of Maccabees
description: First in a mini-series on the history of the Jews and the province of Judea under the Hellenistic empires, and under the Maccabees. I start with a summary of the history I will expand on in the next few episodes. Then I present our sources for that history, Josephus and Maccabees. I conclude with a few notes about the oddities of the Ethiopian orthodox biblical canon.
content:encoded: First in a mini-series on the history of the Jews and the province of Judea under the Hellenistic empires, and under the Maccabees. I start with a summary of the history I will expand on in the next few episodes. Then I present our sources for that history, Josephus and Maccabees. I conclude with a few notes about the oddities of the Ethiopian orthodox biblical canon.
itunes:subtitle: The Jews begin their life under Hellenism.
itunes:author: Garry Stevens
